entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy before morning then periods of snow. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 near noon. High zero. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 25 in the evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023
